channel.title: CVE Feed for arangodb -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-25939|2024-09-16T18:29:04.751Z -- arangodb -- arangodb
item.description: In ArangoDB, versions v3.7.0 through v3.9.0-alpha.1 have a feature which allows downloading a Foxx service from a publicly available URL. This feature does not enforce proper filtering of requests performed internally, which can be abused by a highly-privileged attacker to perform blind SSRF and send internal requests to localhost.
